text: Let's look at how employees can register complaints quickly and safely.
Workers can reach FOS hotline through multiple channels,
toll-free hotline, SMS or WhatsApp, email, the online form, or even the mobile app.
These options ensure that every worker, regardless of literacy or device access,
has a simple and safe way to speak up.
For workers who contact us via phone, SMS, WhatsApp, or email, are trained FOS grievance
officers help them file their cases.
We ask counter questions to extract maximum information, verify details, and launch the
complaint on their behalf.
This is especially helpful for workers who aren't comfortable using digital forms.
We provide an anonymous complaint option.
If someone feels unsafe revealing their identity, the system hides their details from the
company and assigns an anonymous tracking ID.
This is especially important for sensitive issues like harassment or discrimination.
Every complaint goes through a quick review by the FOS team.
We make sure the information is complete and properly categorized before launching it into the system.
Once verified, the system generates a unique ticket number for each complaint.
This ticket number is shared with the worker through an SMS so they know their concern has been officially registered.
At the same time, the assigned investigation officer receives instant notifications via
mobile app and email.
The case appears on their portals right away so they can begin the resolution process without
delay.
This intake process ensures that every voice can be heard clearly, safely, and reliably.
